name: assignment_d
description: Set up a new nodejs project and do the following:    1.	Create a new server (i.e index.js)    2. Establish the following routes (no libraries/frameworks allowed) inside index.js using the specified method: 	   a.	Users: 		      i.	CreateUser - POST 		      ii.	AuthenticateUser - POST 		      iii. getAllUsers - GET 	   b.	Books: 		      i.	Create - POST 		      ii.	Delete - DELETE 		      iii.LoanOut - POST/PUT 		      iv.	Return - POST 		      v.	Update - PUT
